param.name: enable_metadata
param.label: Enable MetaData generation
param.description: If enabled, JoomSEF will generate the metadata according to your custom URLs setting.

param.name: prefer_joomsef_title
param.label: Prefer JoomSEF titles
param.description: Prefer page title created by JoomSEF or the Joomla one.

param.name: use_sitename
param.label: Use sitename in page titles
param.description: Defines how the sitename from global configuration is used in page titles.

param.name: sitename_sep
param.label: Sitename separator
param.description: String used to separate page title and sitename.

param.name: rewrite_keywords
param.label: Rewrite keywords
param.description: Rewrite existing Joomla! keywords with the ones defined in JoomSEF or append them?

param.name: rewrite_description
param.label: Rewrite description
param.description: Rewrite existing Joomla! description with the one defined in JoomSEF or append it?

param.name: prevent_dupl
param.label: Prevent sitename duplicity
param.description: When sitename is same as pagename, prevent duplicity?

param.name: check_base_href
param.label: Set page base href value
param.description: Overwrite Joomla's base href setting value? Use e.g. when images dissapear with SEO URLs turned on.
param.option: Yes - always use only base URL
Yes - always use full SEO URL
